Mesh¶

class decodes.core.dc_mesh.Mesh(vertices=None, faces=None, basis=None)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_has_pts.HasPts

a very simple mesh class

__init__(vertices=None, faces=None, basis=None)¶

Mesh Constructor.

Parameters:
  • vertices ([Point]) – The vertices of the mesh.
  • faces ([int]) – List of ordered faces.
  • basis (Basis) – The (optional) basis of the mesh.
Result :

Mesh object.
Return type:

Mesh

 
pts=[
    Point(0,0,0),
    Point(0,1,0),
    Point(1,1,0),
    Point(1,0,0),
    Point(0,0,1),
    Point(0,1,1),
    Point(1,1,1),
    Point(1,0,1),
    ]

quad_faces=[[0,1,2,3],[4,5,6,7],[0,4,5,1],[3,7,6,2]]
quadmesh=Mesh(pts,quad_faces)
